text: ara kemana ka’re ami bhaya karabo tadera yadera tomara sarika karo, athaca tomara bhaya karo na yakhana allah‌ra sange tomara ansi damra karate ya'o yara jan'ya tini tomadera kache kono sanada pathana ni? Sutaram e'i du'i dalera kara nirapatta sanbandhe besi hak‌dara? Yadi tomara jene thako.’’
